name: workout-challenge
tagline: A tracker for fitness challenges and goals
description: workout_challenge is a self-hosted app for defining and tracking fitness challenges over time. It provides simple dashboards and progress views that help individuals or small groups stay accountable.

features.title: Challenge Creation
features.description: Define fitness challenges with specific goals, duration, and completion criteria

features.title: Progress Tracking
features.description: Log daily or weekly progress toward challenge goals with simple data entry

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: See current challenges, completion status, and upcoming milestones at a glance

features.title: Group Challenges
features.description: Create shared challenges for friends or family to participate in together

features.title: Leaderboards
features.description: Compare progress with other participants to add friendly competition and motivation

features.title: Goal Types
features.description: Support various challenge formats including step counts, workout frequency, or distance targets

features.title: Streak Tracking
features.description: Monitor consecutive days of progress to build consistent fitness habits

features.title: Completion Badges
features.description: Earn virtual badges and achievements when completing challenges or reaching milestones
